name: DGCP Proof 424 | Morning Temperature Check — Jan 2, 2026
description:
This proof documents the morning temperature and humidity check at MaMeeFarm™
at the start of daily work.

The measurement was recorded directly from a physical clock/humidity device,
captured on-site without staging or modification.

This record represents real-world environmental conditions as part of
the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.

No data was edited, reconstructed, or backfilled.
Only direct observation and timestamped capture.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
This work is licensed under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.
All content is part of the MaMeeFarm™ Real-Work Data & Philosophy archive.
